Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear students, The exercise on 18.07. will be a question and answer session where you can ask questions about the lecture and exercise as well as the tutorials and homework sheets. Best regards, René Hosfeld

Messages.Author: Robert Beinert
Messages.Content: Dear students Please keep in mind that there will be no lecture tomorrow (5 July 2024). Best Robert

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Tutorial for Ji Hoon Chun on July 4th cancelled

Messages.Author: Ji Hoon Chun
Messages.Content: The next tutorial will be held on July 11th.

Messages.Author: Robert Beinert
Messages.Content: Liebe Studierende, das Institut für Mathematik sucht neue Tutor:innen. Die Bewerbungsfrist ist der 15. Juli 2024, alle Informationen zum Bewerbungsprozess findet ihr hier: https://www.tu.berlin/go164842 Wir freuen uns auf eure Bewerbungen.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: The office hours on 2nd July and tutorial on 4th July of Dante Luber cancelled

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear Students, The office hours on 2nd July and the tutorial on 4th July of Dante Luber will not take place. Please visit any other tutorial this week. Best regards, René Hosfeld

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Office hours instead of Tutorials (Tue MA 551, Wed MA 774)

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Instead of the tutorials on Tuesday in MA 551 and the tutorial on Wednesday in MA 744, there will now be consultation hours. These will take place as follows: Tuesday, 14:00 - 16:00 in EN 056 (Dante Luber) Wednesday, 14:00 - 16:00 in EN 215 (Ji Hoon Chun) Best Regards, René Hosfeld

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Tutorial of Florian Beier on June 26th cancelled

Messages.Author: Florian Rene Beier
Messages.Content: Dear Students, unfortunately I am sick and have to cancel my Tutorial on Wednesday 14:00. Please visit any other tutorial this week.  Best, Florian

Messages.Author: Robert Beinert
Messages.Content: Dear students Until 29 June 2024 you can separately evaluate the lecture and the exercise of Functional Analysis I. Please find the links to both surveys in the lecture and exercise section on ISIS. We would be happy if many people participate. We will give you also some time for the evaluation in the next lecture/exercise, but you can fill out the surveys at any time. Best Robert

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Tutorial of René 18.06 and Big Exercise 20.06

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear students, My tutorial on 18.06.2024 and the big exercise on 20.06.2024 will not take place. For the tutorial, please go to any other tutorial that week. You can hand in your homework in the lecture or email me.  Best regards, René Hosfeld

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear students, next Wednesday, June 12, the Dies Mathematicus is taking place, colliding with the tutorial on that day. If you want to participate in this event, feel free to go to any other tutorial that week. Best regards, René Hosfeld

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Tutorial on Wednesday in MA744 (Ji Hoon) canceled

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear students, Due to insufficient participation, the Wednesday tutorial in MA 744 from Ji Hoon will be permanently canceled. Students in this group are asked to go to any other tutorial. The tutorial in MA 645 from Florian will take place as usual! Best regards, René Hosfeld

Messages.Author: Ji Hoon Chun
Messages.Content: Hi, someone left their red notebook in MA 142 after today's tutorial in that room.  I have taken the notebook to my colleagues' room E 216 (Elektrotechnische Institute, Altbau) for safekeeping. If it's yours, please pick it up in that room.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Tutorial of Florian Beier on May 22nd cancelled

Messages.Author: Florian Rene Beier
Messages.Content: Dear Students, my tutorial on Wednesday, May 22nd 14:00 will not take place. Please visit any other tutorial this week. You can hand in your homework in the lecture, or send it to my e-mail. Best, Florian Beier

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear Students, the tutorials on Tuesday, May 14, and Thursday, May 16, given by Dante Luber (both in MA 551) will not take place. Please visit any other tutorial this week. You can hand in your homework in the lecture. Best regards, your Functional Analysis 1 Team

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear students, as Thursday May 9 is a public holiday. Those who would have had a tutorial on that day can go to the tutorials on Tuesday or Wednesday and hand in their homework in the lecture. Please write your tutorial on your homework. Best regards, your Functional Analysis 1 Team

Messages.Author: René Hosfeld
Messages.Content: Dear students, as Wednesday May 1st is a public holiday. Those who would have had a tutorial on that day can go to the tutorials on Tuesday or Thursday and hand in their homework in the lecture tomorrow. Please write your tutorial on your homework. Best regards, your Functional Analysis 1 Team

Messages.Author: Robert Beinert
Messages.Content: Dear Students Please keep in mind that the registration for the tutorials is open until tomorrow, April 17, 18:00. If you want to participate please register via MOSES. All the best Robert

Messages.Author: Robert Beinert
Messages.Content: Dear students, I added a brief proof regarding the uniqueness of the best approximation in Theorem 7.10, which we had left open in the lecture today. Please find the updated chapter on ISIS. Best Robert

Messages.Author: Robert Beinert
Messages.Content: Dear all To show that Theorem 6.12 holds true also for non-Banach spaces, I have replaced the Banach-Steinhaus Theorem by an extension argument. Please find the updated script with the corrected proof on ISIS. Best Robert
